text: 15.29: Wkp 17.14; FG 15.20; 21.25; VB 2.14; 2.20‘Nde guma the tuma kargip ana nɨman tɨgɨrga sɨk, nde anan mbɨ thari. Nde vhɨra vɨzɨnan mbɨ thari. Nde vhɨra guma fhɨrar fagim rimgi sɨk, nde vhɨra ana mbɨ thari. Nde vhɨra mbarkɨrga tɨvi mbatɨgi, gumgi gu mbigi mbe ruarir wari kɨɨv, mba tɨvi ga mbui, nde mba tɨvir muuŋ thari.’ Nde maaŋ muuŋgip tuituigira wari ganɨv, khaŋ muuŋgi tɨvi mbatɨgi nde ntan muuŋ tharga ne nzerara. Nza nde nzuai bunira khare. Nde nzerara kɨri.”
